name: ILI Surveillance Form
description: A form used to capture ILI  Cases

questions.label: Date of Onset of the current illness

alert.message: Temperature is out of range (Normal range 35-37)
Respiratory Rate is out of range (Normal range 12-16)
Oxygen Saturation is out of range (Normal range 95-100)

questions.label: Has the patient received any of the following vaccination?
Was the vaccine given in the past 12 months
Was this verified using a vaccination card or hospital records
How many doses of COVID-19 were given?
Was this verified using a vaccination card or hospital records
Since the patients Vaccination has She/He been tested for COVID-19?
What was the COVID-19 test result?
Was any specimen collected from this patient for Influenza testing
